heading: HB03803
0: AN ACT RENAMING THE LAND BANK OF THE PHILIPPINES TO THE FARMERS BANK OF THE PHILIPPINES, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE SECTION 74 OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 3844, ENTITLED 'AN ACT TO ORDAIN THE AGRICULTURAL LAND REFORM CODE AND TO INSTITUTE LAND REFORMS IN THE PHILIPPINES INCLUDING THE ABOLITION OF TENANCY AND THE CHANNELING OF CAPITAL INTO INDUSTRY, PROVIDE FOR THE NECESSARY IMPLEMENTING AGENCIES, APPROPRIATE FUNDS THEREFOR, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES'

history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB03803
FULL TITLE : AN ACT RENAMING THE LAND BANK OF THE PHILIPPINES TO THE FARMERS BANK OF THE PHILIPPINES, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE SECTION 74 OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 3844, ENTITLED 'AN ACT TO ORDAIN THE AGRICULTURAL LAND REFORM CODE AND TO INSTITUTE LAND REFORMS IN THE PHILIPPINES INCLUDING THE ABOLITION OF TENANCY AND THE CHANNELING OF CAPITAL INTO INDUSTRY, PROVIDE FOR THE NECESSARY IMPLEMENTING AGENCIES, APPROPRIATE FUNDS THEREFOR, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES'
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CAMINERO, WILFREDO S., VILLARIN, TOM S.
DATE FILED : 2016-09-27
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Economic
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2016-11-22
          -1st meeting. Deferred further consideration pending submission of a study on the cost of the name change.
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON BANKS AND FINANCIAL INTERMEDIARIES ON 2016-10-03
